titles.title: To extend until January 1, 1996, the previously existing suspension of duty on Trimethyl Base.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/19/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on 1,3,3-trimethyl-2-methyleneindoline (trimethyl base).
